name: Down to Hell
description: Down to hell is a dynamic slasher in which lone swordsman must face the hordes of hellish demons. On five huge levels, fighting against more than thirty kinds of enemies, the player will learn the story of a nameless knight and a mysterious girl. Each and every one of the demons will have a couple of different attacks, which will require a different reaction from the player. On each stage, there will be at least two mini-bosses, as well as one more powerful boss that will be waiting at the end of each level. Each of them will check the player’s fighting skills and make the win truly satisfying.
